body.p: This page is generated by Machine Translation from Japanese.

section.name: NOT search
section.p: If you want to find documents that do not contain a Word can NOT find. Locate the NOT search as NOT in front of the Word does not contain. Is NOT in uppercase characters ago and need space.
For example, searches, enter if you want to find documents that contain the search term 1 does not contain a search term 2 search term 1 NOT search words 2.

p.b: Attention is required because NOT find expensive.
